title: Quick and Easy Chicken Noodle Soup Recipe
description: This easy chicken noodle soup recipe made with veggies and leftover chicken is warm, comforting, and ready to ladle into bowls in just over 30 minutes.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Soups, Stews and Chili Recipes Soup Recipes Chicken Soup Recipes Chicken Noodle Soup Recipes Quick and Easy Chicken Noodle Soup 4.8 (3,637) 2,617 Reviews 618 Photos A chicken noodle soup recipe that's a very easy, very good substitute for when you don't have time to make your soup totally from scratch. Submitted by marymerharhotmailcom Updated on October 10, 2024 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 618 618 618 618 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 30 mins Total Time: 40 mins Servings: 6 Jump to Nutrition Facts Jump to recipe This chicken noodle soup recipe can be on the table in just 40 minutes! Whether you're feeling under the weather or you're just in need of a little comfort, this comforting soup will warm you up from the inside out. Chicken Noodle Soup Ingredients Here's what you'll need for this top-rated chicken noodle soup recipe: ¬∑ Onions and Celery: In the first step of this chicken noodle soup recipe, diced onions and chopped celery are cooked in butter until they're aromatic and tender.¬∑ Broth: This chicken noodle soup recipe calls for a mixture of chicken and vegetable broths. If you're short on time or ingredients, you can just use one or the other.¬∑ Chicken: Of course, you'll need chicken. If you have leftover rotisserie chicken, you can use that in place of the cooked chicken breasts for a budget-friendly shortcut.¬∑ Noodles: Make sure you don't add the noodles too early, as cooking them too long will make them mushy.¬∑ Carrots: Carrots, which add a pop of bright color and flavor, are added at the end of cooking so they stay crisp. You can add them to the saut√©ed vegetables at the beginning if you like your carrots tender.¬∑ Basil and Oregano: Dried basil and oregano lend warm, earthy flavor to this chicken noodle soup recipe. I Tested Five Popular Chicken Noodle Soup Recipes and the Winner Was Pure Comfort How to Make Chicken Noodle Soup You'll find the full recipe below, but here are a few tips to keep in mind while you make this classic chicken noodle soup recipe: Best Noodles For Chicken Noodle Soup Egg noodles are the traditional choice for chicken noodle soup. Rotini and fusilli would work well too, but you can use whatever you have on hand in a pinch. Customize to Taste We love the simplicity of this easy chicken noodle soup recipe. However, you can get creative with spices and seasonings. Reviewers say they like to add bay leaves, garlic, herbes de Provence, rosemary, and thyme. Improvise With Ingredients You Already Have This recipe lends itself to convenient, budget-friendly substitutions. Try rotisserie chicken instead of cooked chicken breasts, water and bouillon cubes instead of broth, or oil instead of butter. How to Make the Best Soups What Goes With Chicken Noodle Soup? Chicken noodle soup is a meal in and of itself, so you don't really need to pair it with any sides (besides maybe a few saltine crackers). But, if you want to go the extra mile, try something bread-based to soak up all that delicious broth. Here are some delicious options: ¬∑ Basic Biscuits¬∑ Grilled Cheese Sandwich¬∑ French Baguettes¬∑ Classic Dinner Rolls¬∑ Toasted Garlic Bread How to Store Chicken Noodle Soup Store leftover chicken noodle soup in an airtight container in the refrigerator for three to four days. Can You Freeze Chicken Noodle Soup? Yes! You can freeze chicken noodle soup ‚Äî and you should if you don't plan to eat it within a few days. If you're making this recipe with the intention of freezing it, consider preparing the soup and noodles separately. Frozen noodles will break down and become mushy when thawed. To freeze chicken noodle soup (with or without the noodles), pour serving-sized portions of the cooled soup into freezer bags labeled with the date. Freeze for up to six months. Re-heat on the stove. Allrecipes Community Tips and Praise "This is so easy to make and so good," raves Gr8typist. "I cook the chicken breasts in the broth to make the broth a bit richer, then build the soup from there." "This recipe has been our family's go to chicken noodle soup for years!" raves another Allrecipes member. "It's also super easy to make when you don't feel well! I add about 3 more cups of broth so that I can just use a whole pound of noodles. So delicious!" "Very easy," according to Joy Shelton Frazier. "So flavorful! Great comfort food on a cold night. We made grilled cheese sandwiches to go along with it." Editorial contributions by Corey Williams Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 1 tablespoon butter ¬Ω cup chopped onion ¬Ω cup chopped celery 4 (14.5 ounce) cans chicken broth 1 (14.5 ounce) can vegetable broth ¬Ω pound chopped cooked chicken breast 1 ¬Ω cups egg noodles 1 cup sliced carrots ¬Ω teaspoon dried basil ¬Ω teaspoon dried oregano salt and ground black pepper to taste Directions Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat. Add onion and celery and cook until just tender, about 5 minutes. Add chicken broth, vegetable broth, chicken, egg noodles, carrots, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes. Allrecipes I Made It Print 8,387 home cooks made it! Yes, leftovers heck yeah man ‚Ä¶ Always awesomeness when cooking with you‚Ä¶ My son passed away and this was one of his favorite recipes‚Ä¶ I Love You Joe‚Ä¶ I will be setting a bowl out for you when finished‚Ä¶ I üò¢ ü•∞ Miss you Son I know you‚Äôre up there in heaven with a full tummy‚Ä¶ Mom knows you had dinner with your angelic friends, with this angelic recipe‚Ä¶ Will always use with mine‚Ä¶ Love Mom, Kathy‚Ä¶ 04 of 618 Photo by¬† RosyGin5752 02/09/2025 A keeper! We added a few extra spices onion powder 05 of 618 Photo by¬† missi 01/20/2025 Great flavors Easy to follow Crowd-pleaser A keeper! Great easy recipe that you can change up to suit your taste. I added twice the veggies and it was really tasty. 06 of 618 Photo by¬† CleverStew1563 01/03/2025 Great flavors Easy to follow Excellent chicken noodle soup, the only thing i did different was make own chicken broth and no vegetable broth just same overall broth amount. 07 of 618 Photo by¬† QuirkyFish9787 10/29/2024 A keeper! Great flavors Easy to follow Worth the effort I loved the recipe but I like a little kick to my soup so I put 1 red pepper flakes package that you get with take out pizza and small bay leaf plus yellow 1 squash and the Asian noodles that cook in three mins and lots of carrots and celery. Delicious so easy on a cool October day. The only draw back is I ate Too much. So good 08 of 618 Photo by¬† jessie725 10/19/2024 Great flavors Family favorite Worth the effort It turned out better than we expected! 09 of 618 Photo by¬† CleverDip3113 09/30/2024 Easy to follow A keeper! Worth the effort 10 of 618 Photo by¬† cpack1000 08/03/2024 Easy to follow Great flavors I thought it sounded great for basic soup. I added cauliflower and broccoli in addition to onion and carrots. Used chicken stock for half the liquid and better than bouillon itialian spice for other half. I also added 1 tbsp fish sauce. 1 2 3 4 5 Next You‚Äôll Also Love Incredibly Easy Chicken and Noodles 616 Ratings Easy Instant Pot Chicken Noodle Soup 23 Ratings Instant Pot Creamy Chicken Noodle Soup 2 Ratings Chicken Soba Noodle Soup 1 Rating Homemade Roasted Chicken Noodle Soup 5 Ratings Chicken Ramen Soup 2 Ratings Slow Cooker Chicken Taco Soup 7,446 Ratings Great-Aunt Nina's Noodles and Chicken 110 Ratings Chicken Noodle Soup III 3 Ratings Homemade Chicken Noodle Soup 3 Ratings Jean's Homemade Chicken Noodle Soup 235 Ratings Spicy Chicken Noodle Soup 3 Ratings Chinese Chicken Soup 57 Ratings Easy Slow Cooker Chicken Noodle Soup 2 Ratings Instant Pot Lentil Chicken Noodle Soup 2 Ratings Angela's Asian-Inspired Chicken Noodle Soup 27 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices ¬† Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith¬†publishing¬†family. instructions: Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat. Add onion and celery and cook until just tender, about 5 minutes.;Add chicken broth, vegetable broth, chicken, egg noodles, carrots, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine and bring to a boil.;Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes. Allrecipes
